tool_description: QR Code as Application programming interface
name: qrest
title: qrest

api_list.name: Custom QR Code
api_list.description: Use this to create custom qr codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qrest.p.rapidapi.com/custom"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qrest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qrest.p.rapidapi.com/custom"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qrest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
